name: Pomodoro Technique
why_it_works: Helps maintain high focus levels and prevents mental fatigue through scheduled breaks.

name: Feynman Technique
why_it_works: Explaining a concept in simple terms identifies gaps in your own understanding.

name: Active Recall
why_it_works: Testing yourself forces the brain to retrieve information, strengthening neural pathways.

name: Spaced Repetition
why_it_works: Reviewing material at increasing intervals prevents forgetting and moves information to long-term memory.

name: Japanese technique
why_it_works: Forces recall by writing everything remembered, revealing weak points in understanding.

name: Mind Mapping
why_it_works: Visually organizing information helps connect ideas and improves comprehension.

name: Dual Coding
why_it_works: Combining visuals with text improves memory retention and understanding.

name: SQ3R Method
why_it_works: A structured reading approach improves comprehension and recall.

name: Visualization
why_it_works: Creating mental images improves memory and conceptual understanding.

name: Chunking
why_it_works: Breaking information into smaller chunks makes it easier to remember.
